results.title: Configure the admin consent workflow - Microsoft Entra ID
results.description: Configure the admin consent workflow In this article, you learn how to configure the admin consent workflow to enable users to request access to applications that require admin consent. You enable the ability to make requests by using an admin consent workflow. For more information on consenting to applications, see User and admin consent. The.
